languages.text: "Мое сердце полнится печалью и скорбью. Ни одно Дитя Азуриана не заслуживает смерти от руки мон-кай. Ее путь окончился слишком скоро".

traits.locale_text: "Мое сердце полнится печалью и скорбью. Ни одно дитя Азуриан не заслуживает смерти от руки мон-кай. Ее путь окончился слишком скоро".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."
languages.original_text: "Мое сердце полнится печалью и скорбью. Ни одно Дитя Азуриана не заслуживает смерти от руки мон-кай. Ее путь окончился слишком скоро".

traits.locale_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her path was cut short too soon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her path was cut short too soon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Mi corazón se llena de tristeza y pesadumbre. Ningún hijo de Asuryan merece morir a manos de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. Su senda se ha truncado de manera prematura».
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: «Mi corazón se llena de tristeza y pesadumbre. Ningún hijo de Asuryan merece morir a manos de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh. Su senda se ha truncado de manera prematura».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「私の心は嘆きと悲しみでいっぱいだ。アシュリアンの御子の誰一人も、モン＝ケイの手によって死ぬには値しない。彼女の道はあまりにも早く断たれてしまった」
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: 「私の心は嘆きと悲しみでいっぱいだ。アシュリアンの御子の誰一人も、モン＝ケイの手によって死ぬには値しない。彼女の道はあまりにも早く断たれてしまった」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我的心中充满了悲伤和哀痛。阿苏焉之子不该死在猴子手里，她的道途过早地结束了。”
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: “我的心中充满了悲伤和哀痛。阿苏焉之子不该死在猴子手里，她的道途过早地结束了。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Mon cœur est lourd de chagrin et de douleur. Aucun enfant d'Asuryan ne mérite de mourir des mains d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh. Sa Voie a été interrompue trop tôt. »
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: « Mon cœur est lourd de chagrin et de douleur. Aucun enfant d'Asuryan ne mérite de mourir des mains d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh. Sa Voie a été interrompue trop tôt. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Mein Herz ist erfüllt von Trauer und Schmerz. Kein Kind von Asuryan hat es verdient, durch die Hände {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey zu sterben. Ihr Weg war kurz und endete zu früh."
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz ist erfüllt von Trauer und Schmerz. Kein Kind von Asuryan hat es verdient, durch die Hände {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey zu sterben. Ihr Weg war kurz und endete zu früh."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yüreğim kederle ve acıyla doldu. Hiçbir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu, bir mon-keigh'in ellerinde ölümü kucaklamayı hak etmez. Yolu çok erken son bulmuş."
languages.original_text: "My heart is filled with sorrow and grief. No Child of Asuryan deserves to die at the hands of a mon-keigh. Her Path was cut short too soon."

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğim keder ve acıyla doldu. Hiçbir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu, bir mon-keigh'in ellerinde nihayete ermeyi hak etmez. Yolunun sonuna çok erken geldi."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
